Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: ~varadatibm moving this to future for now after discussion with ~mastersingh24 , the current plan is to have a separate daemon to handle generation of channel configs and updates in the context of a participating organization. ~jyellick is handling this work so the above list of requirements should be directed to the work that he's doing for v1.0.0. we can evaluate later whether the same is still needed in the SDKs.

Action.author: varadatibm
Action.body: ~jimthematrix I thought the daemon was for adding a consortium member... But this is for getting the list of consortiums and the membership... Is there a way to get that?
